message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $95. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $110. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice,  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a little too high for me.  I'm happy to meet you at $105. This is my final offer.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your final offer of $105. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $115. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
